mapper.sql: HC_ID, HY_ID, CARD_ID, HC_TIME, HC_NUM, HC_NO, HC_PASS, HC_STATE
mapper.select:
select hc_id, ch.hy_id, ch.card_id, hc_time, hc_num, hc_no, hc_pass, hc_state, hh.hy_name,ct.card_name from card_huiyuanbanka ch left join hygl_huiyuan hh on ch.hy_id = hh.hy_id left join card_type ct on ch.card_id = ct.card_id
and hh.hy_name like concat('%',concat(#{hyName},'%'))
and ct.card_name like concat('%',concat(#{cardName},'%'))
order by hc_time desc

select hc_id, ch.hy_id, ch.card_id, hc_time, hc_num, hc_no, hc_pass, hc_state, hh.hy_name,hh.hy_no,ct.card_name,ct.card_yucunjine from card_huiyuanbanka ch left join hygl_huiyuan hh on ch.hy_id = hh.hy_id left join card_type ct on ch.card_id = ct.card_id where hc_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into CARD_HUIYUANBANKA (HC_ID, HY_ID, CARD_ID, HC_TIME, HC_NUM, HC_NO, HC_PASS, HC_STATE) values (#{hcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hcTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hcNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{hcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hcPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into CARD_HUIYUANBANKA
HC_ID,
HY_ID,
CARD_ID,
HC_TIME,
HC_NUM,
HC_NO,
HC_PASS,
HC_STATE,
#{hcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hcTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{hcNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{hcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hcPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{hcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update CARD_HUIYUANBANKA
HY_ID = #{hyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_ID = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HC_TIME = #{hcTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
HC_NUM = #{hcNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HC_NO = #{hcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HC_PASS = #{hcPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HC_STATE = #{hcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where HC_ID = #{hcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CARD_HUIYUANBANKA set HY_ID = #{hyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_ID = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HC_TIME = #{hcTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HC_NUM = #{hcNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HC_NO = #{hcNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HC_PASS = #{hcPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HC_STATE = #{hcState,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where HC_ID = #{hcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
